entry.title: ConceptNet5 Data download using Torrent
entry.content:
ConceptNet

ConceptNet is a semantic network containing lots of things computers should know about the world, especially when understanding text written by people.
It is built from nodes representing words or short phrases of natural language, and labeled relationships between them. (We call the nodes “concepts” for tradition, but they’d be better known as “terms”.) These are the kinds of relationships computers need to know to search for information better, answer questions, and understand people’s goals. [source]

Downloading ConceptNet5 Data

If you want all the data in ConceptNet for your application, you can have it from here

Downloading ConceptNet5 Using Torrent

As you can see the data file are so big that one may have hardships downloading these if Internet bandwidth is not so good. Below are the links of torrents for each file.

  • conceptnet5_db_5.4.torrent.

  • conceptnet5_flat_csv_5.4.torrent.

  • conceptnet5_flat_json_5.4.torrent.

  • conceptnet5_flat_msgpack_5.4.torrent.

  • conceptnet5_raw_data_5.4.torrent.

  • conceptnet5_vector_space_5.4.torrent.
